document.full_text: the summers brothers built a spear-like vehicle that in 1965 set the world speed record for wheel-driven cars, a record that stood for 26 years.
document.title: bill summers, car builder who set a speed record, dies at 75
lines_and_colors: the summers brothers built a spear-like vehicle that in 1965 set the world speed record for wheel-driven cars, a record that stood for 26 years.
